definition: (coll.) to regret/what a pity! (loanword from Japanese "zannen")
to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus

to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
variant of 念[nian4], to read aloud
crash/breakdown (of social values etc)/burst/to crumble/to collapse
(of dreams, hopes etc) to vanish/to evaporate/(of a person) to become disillusioned/disillusionment
standard form (of a Chinese character)/plain font style (as opposed to bold or italic)/printed style (as opposed to cursive)/(Tw) traditional (i.e. unsimplified) characters
to blacken/abbr. for 涅槃[nie4 pan2]
to rely on/to base oneself on
